metadata.synopsis: He-Man (John Erwin), master of the universe, fights villains and saves a winged horse with She-Ra (Melendy Britt), princess of power.
metadata.director: Ed Friedman, Lou Kachivas, Marsh Lamore, Bill Reed, Gwen Wetzler

reviews: The amalgam of fairytale, sci-fi and Greek mythology is exciting.
Classic '80s duo teams up in battles, bravery, friendship.
I was surprised to see that the movie was even better than I remembered. And though it's no longer my favorite, it endures as an affecting cinematic experience.
A Saturday morning kiddie cartoon stretched out to feature length, which by some lights is an awfully long time.
Though hardly a lost classic, the cartoon's irony-free approach and bizarre characters show why it resonates today.
